data.Title: Robinhood Markets, Inc. to Announce Third Quarter 2024 Results on October 30, 2024
data.Description: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ: HOOD) has announced that it will release its third quarter 2024 financial results on Wednesday, October 30, 2024, after market close. An earnings conference call will be held at 2:00 PM PT / 5:00 PM ET on the same day. A live webcast and supporting materials will be available at investors.robinhood.com, with a replay and transcript posted later.

data.Title: Robinhood Shares Are Trading Higher Today: What You Need To Know

data.Title: Robinhood Markets, Inc. to Present at the Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference on September 10, 2024
data.Description:
/EIN News/ -- MENLO PARK, Calif., Sept. 03, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Robinhood Markets, Inc. (‚ÄúRobinhood‚Äù) (NASDAQ: HOOD) today announced that it will be participating in the upcoming Goldman Sachs Communacopia + Technology Conference on Tuesday, September 10, 2024.

Robinhood Chief Executive Officer and Co-Founder Vlad Tenev is scheduled to present on Tuesday, September 10, 2024, at 3:05 PM PT / 6:05 PM ET. Interested parties may access a live audio webcast of the presentation by visiting investors.robinhood.com. Following the presentation, a recording will be available for replay for at least 90 days on the same website.

data.Title: Robinhood app purchase to sustain healthy competition
data.Description:
Thailand's on-demand delivery sector should see healthy competition with the Robinhood food delivery app remaining in the market, say industry observers.

Alibaba's e-marketplace Lazada plans to launch its LazMart grocery delivery service this year, while Socialcommerce giant ByteDance's TikTok plans a foray into the service sector in Indonesia and Thailand.

data.Title: Robinhood Announces First Investor Day on December 4, 2024

The event will be live streamed with the option for some of our institutional and retail investors and analysts to attend in person. We‚Äôll share more about our vision for the next 10+ years and how that can drive customer and shareholder value. We also plan to answer questions from investors and analysts.

data.Title: Robinhood Crypto Launches Crypto Transfers in Europe
data.Description: MENLO PARK, Calif., Oct. 01, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Robinhood Crypto has launched crypto transfers for customers in Europe, which is one of the most requested features in the region. Crypto transfers enable customers to deposit and withdraw more than 20 cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), USD Coin (USDC), and others, giving them greater flexibility and control over their digital assets. For a full list of supported cryptocurrencies, please visit our Help Center.

data.Description: I'm really proud of our Q3 results and how smoothly our product engine is humming,‚Äù said Vlad Tenev, CEO and Co-Founder of Robinhood. ‚ÄúIn the past month, we introduced Robinhood Legend, our new desktop offering, and announced index options, futures, and a realized profit and loss tool are coming soon. And just this week, we launched our Presidential Election Market. We have a ton of momentum, and we‚Äôre just getting started.

data.Title: Robinhood stock soars to 52-week high, hits $28.36
data.Description: In a remarkable turnaround, Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) stock has reached a 52-week high, touching $28.36. This milestone reflects a significant recovery for the company, which has seen its value surge by an impressive 209.96% over the past year. Investors have rallied behind the popular trading platform, propelling the stock to new heights and marking a period of robust growth.

data.Title: Breaking: Robinhood Reports 165% Crypto Revenue Growth In Q3
data.Description: As the firm noted, its crypto revenue shot up by 165% to $61 million over the quarter. This performance is not unexpected for Robinhood as it completed the acquisition of Bitstamp earlier, thus boosting its overall volume.

data.Title: Crypto Pays Off: Robinhood Posts 165% Revenue Growth In Q3 Earnings Report
data.Description: Robinhood, a popular American financial services company, is finally out of the woods. In its third-quarter filing ending September 30th, 2024, the company disclosed its revenues were up by 165%, and its overall year-to-date (YTD) net deposits increased to $34 million.

data.Title: Earnings call: Robinhood Q3 2024 results show strong growth, new products
data.Description: In the latest earnings call, Robinhood Markets , Inc. (HOOD) reported robust financial growth for Q3 2024, with CEO Vlad Tenev emphasizing the company's progress in key strategic areas including active trader market penetration, customer wallet share expansion, and international growth.

data.Title: Robinhood shares drop as growth push takes a toll on Q3 results
data.Description: Shares of Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) Markets fell 14% on Thursday after more than doubling in value this year, as incentives aimed to attract customer assets hurt the retail trading platform's third-quarter results.

data.Title: Analyst Estimates: Here's What Brokers Think Of Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) After Its Third-Quarter Report
data.Description: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) missed earnings with its latest third-quarter results, disappointing overly-optimistic forecasters. Robinhood Markets missed analyst forecasts, with revenues of US$637m and statutory earnings per share (EPS) of US$0.17, falling short by 3.2% and 3.4% respectively.

data.Title: Robinhood Falls After Revenue Miss on Customer Promotion Program
data.Description: Robinhood Markets Inc. fell after the brokerage reported revenue that missed analyst estimates because of a customer promotion program that required the firm to offset a portion of the haul.

data.Title: Robinhood tumbles as customer incentives eat into results
data.Description: Robinhood Markets Inc (NASDAQ:HOOD) sunk over 15% on Thursday after reporting incentives aimed at drawing in customers had eaten into revenue over the third quarter.

data.Title: Robinhood earnings miss Street expectations, shares tumble 11%
data.Description: Retail trading platform Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD)'s third-quarter earnings fell short of expectations on Wednesday, a miss it attributed to an accounting quirk related to incentives that the company said Wall Street analysts had overlooked, sending its shares down 11% after the bell.

data.Title: Introducing the Presidential Election Market
data.Description: Two weeks ago, we hosted hundreds of Robinhood customers in Miami at our inaugural HOOD Summit. There, we announced Robinhood Legend, and that index options and futures would be coming soon, offered by Robinhood Derivatives, LLC (RHD). Now RHD is following up on this announcement with the launch of presidential election event contracts, ahead of the November 5 general election.

data.Title: Robinhood Partners with Howard University to Empower Student-Athletes with Financial Education
data.Description: Robinhood Markets, Inc. is excited to announce a new partnership with Howard University, aimed at addressing the financial challenges student-athletes often face. This marks Robinhood‚Äôs first partnership with a Historically Black College or University (HBCU), bringing its signature Money Drills program to Howard, the ninth D1 university for the program, and expanding access to comprehensive financial education for student-athletes. Through this collaboration, participants will gain the tools and knowledge needed to secure a stable financial future, both during and after their athletic careers.

data.Title: Robinhood stock soars to 52-week high, hits $28.58
data.Description: In a remarkable turnaround, Robinhood Markets Inc (NASDAQ:HOOD). shares have surged to a 52-week high, reaching a price level of $28.58. This milestone underscores a significant recovery for the company, which has become synonymous with the democratization of trading for retail investors. Over the past year, Robinhood's stock has witnessed an impressive rally, with the 1-year change data showcasing a staggering 191.19% increase. This surge reflects growing investor confidence and the company's potential to capitalize on the expanding market of casual traders.

data.Title: Why Robinhood, Coinbase, and MicroStrategy Shares Skyrocketed on Wednesday
data.Description: Investors have been speculating for months about the impact of the U.S. presidential election on crypto markets, and the value of both crypto and crypto-related stocks soared on Wednesday as results were finalized. Bitcoin (BTC) had the biggest symbolic move, climbing 8.5% in the past 24 hours as of 10 a.m. ET, but some stocks made bigger moves.

data.Title: Schwab, Interactive Brokers, and Robinhood Soar Following Trump Victory
data.Description: Shares of wealth managers and brokerage firms such as Charles Schwab , Robinhood , and Morgan Stanley soared Wednesday morning as President Donald Trump‚Äôs election ushered in expectations for less regulation and a more business-friendly environment.

data.Title: SoFi and Robinhood Stocks Rise After Trump Win. They‚Äôre Up for the Same Reason
data.Description: Fintech and crypto-related stocks were trading higher following news that Donald Trump won the presidency.

data.Title: Trump Media share price surge 40% overnight on Robinhood amid speculation of Donald Trump‚Äôs election win
data.Description: Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group, the Socialmedia company founded by former U.S. President Donald Trump, surged as early results from the U.S. presidential election began to roll in. The stock rallied 10% by the close of formal after-hours trading on Tuesday, the US Election Day.

data.Description:
Robinhood has stated that it has no plans to hold Bitcoin for investment purposes.

data.Title: CFTC requests Robinhood Derivatives to halt sports event contracts
data.Description:
Investing.com -- The Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) has officially asked Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) Derivatives, LLC (RHD) to halt customer access to sports event contracts.
In response to the CFTC's request, RHD has put a pause on the launch of its Pro Football Championship market. The product, which had been introduced to approximately 1% of RHD's customer base, will now see a delay. Customers who have already placed trades will be given the option to either close their positions or continue until resolution.

data.Title: Why Robinhood CEO is mixed on a US sovereign wealth fund
data.Description: Robinhood (HOOD) has been on one of the more blistering paces of innovation from the fintech space the last twelve months. The overarching goal? Make the platform way more than a place for a 22-year-old to trade GameStop (GME). Think of a one-stop shop for stocks, crypto, retirement, and even credit cards. Brian Sozzi sits down on the Opening Bid podcast with the person leading the charge at Robinhood on these fronts, co-founder and CEO Vlad Tenev. The company has expanded into event contracts with a successful debut for the election ‚Äî although efforts to wade into the Super Bowl were frowned upon by lawmakers. In January, the platform provider debuted futures and index options trading. The company has since released Robinhood Legend, billed as a sleeker platform that targets more sophisticated traders. Robinhood Legend allows up to eight charts open in a single window, and it could elevate various technical indicators such as Bollinger Bands. This as the Trump administration eyes stablecoin frameworks this year and explores the potential of a bitcoin reserve ‚Äî both of which could be major tailwinds to Robinhood and competitors such as Coinbase (COIN).

data.Title: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev to Attend Key Financial Event
data.Description: On March 4, 2025, it was announced by Eleanor Terrett on Twitter that Robinhood's CEO, Vlad Tenev, would be attending a significant event (Terrett, 2025). This news sparked immediate interest and volatility in the cryptocurrency markets, particularly in tokens associated with trading platforms and financial technology. At 10:00 AM EST on the same day, the price of Robinhood's native token, $HOOD, surged by 5.2% from $2.10 to $2.21, reflecting heightened market anticipation (CoinMarketCap, 2025). Simultaneously, trading volumes for $HOOD increased by 35%, reaching 1.2 million tokens traded within the first hour of the announcement (CryptoCompare, 2025). Additionally, other fintech-related tokens such as $COIN (Coinbase) and $FTT (FTX) experienced minor upticks of 1.5% and 1.2% respectively, indicating a broader market sentiment shift (CoinGecko, 2025). On-chain metrics for $HOOD showed a significant increase in active addresses, rising from 1,500 to 2,300 within the same hour, suggesting heightened engagement from the community (Blockchain.com, 2025). The event's announcement also coincided with a slight increase in the overall market cap of cryptocurrencies by 0.8%, highlighting the interconnectedness of financial news and crypto market dynamics (TradingView, 2025).

data.Title: Robinhood Shares Are Down Today: What's Going On?
data.Description:
Robinhood Markets Inc. shares traded lower Monday as financial stocks declined amid concerns over tariffs and trade policy.

What To Know: The drop follows President Donald Trump's decision to delay tariffs on certain Mexican and Canadian goods under the USMCA agreement until April 2. The pause spares automobiles, beer, avocados and building materials from immediate price hikes but does not cover all imports. Canadian energy exports, including crude oil, remain subject to a 10% tariff, which could impact gas prices and add to inflationary pressures.

data.Title: Robinhood's $29.8M Nightmare: FINRA Slams Trading Giant as Stock Crashes 13%
data.Description: Robinhood Markets faced a sharp 13% decline in its stock price at 10.54am today, after agreeing to pay a $29.8 million fine imposed by the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority. The penalty stems from multiple alleged violations, including failures in its clearing technology system and anti-money laundering programs. Regulators found that Robinhood converted market orders into limit orders without providing customers with accurate disclosures, failed to detect or report suspicious activity, and inadequately supervised its clearing operations, particularly during heightened trading volumes. The firm also came under scrutiny for not properly monitoring social media promotions from compensated influencers, some of whom made misleading claims to investors.

data.Title: Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
data.Description: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) fell 7.1% in the morning session after markets seemed to have caught "tariff/trade war fever" once again (Nasdaq down 1.9%, S&P 500 down 1.2%) amid broader geopolitical anxiety. The volatility was perhaps also related to uncertainty surrounding the Fed's rate decision to be announced later in the week. The consensus estimate was for the Fed to keep interest rates at the range of 4.25%-4.5%. This could be a bit of a letdown for the dovish camp, expecting some policy relief to help offset the growing market weakness amid the ongoing trade war, which some analysts considered to be bad for growth and corporate earnings.

data.Title: Robinhood Markets (NasdaqGS:HOOD) Reports Revenue Doubling To US$1,014M Despite 1% Stock Dip
data.Description: Robinhood Markets recently announced strong gains for the fourth quarter of 2024, with revenue doubling to USD 1,014 million and net income rising significantly to USD 916 million. Despite these robust financial results and the completion of a share repurchase program comprising over 1% of total shares, the company's stock price saw a modest decline of 1.04% over the last quarter. This movement occurs amid broader market volatility, where indexes like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite have experienced downturns of 8.9% and 12.5% from their December highs. Factors such as the souring investor sentiment due to economic uncertainties and general declines in major tech stocks may have overshadowed Robinhood's otherwise positive performance and strategic buyback efforts, reflecting a cautious market stance on tech-related equities.

data.Description: Robinhood Markets saw a significant price movement last week with a 10% uptick possibly influenced by broader market dynamics and company-specific factors. Investor focus has been drawn to how the Federal Reserve's upcoming meeting might affect financial markets, but Robinhood‚Äôs price gain indicates company-centric catalysts or shifts in investor sentiment specific to its sector or business operations. data.Title: Robinhood Faces Bay State Probe Over Sports Futures Contracts
data.Description: Massachusetts subpoenaed financial technology company Robinhood last week seeking information about its new sports event futures trading product available in 49 states. It relaunched following behind-the-scenes communication with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC). While the federal CFTC is the de facto overseer of futures trading for now, states are now taking a close look at whether platforms such as the one from Robinhood violate state betting laws. Nevada recently sent Kalshi, the exchange that powers Robinhood‚Äôs sports event futures, a cease-and-desist letter. As Sportico has reported, industry insiders widely view state actions as a greater threat to the burgeoning futures industry than the CFTC. Reuters was the first to report the Massachusetts subpoena, with Massachusetts Secretary of the Commonwealth Bill Galvin saying that the sports futures trading product ‚Äúis just another gimmick from a company that‚Äôs very good at gimmicks to lure investors away from sound investing.‚Äù Galvin‚Äôs office confirmed the reporting in an emailed statement but declined to provide further comment about whether it would probe platforms in addition to Robinhood. Robinhood denied wrongdoing. ‚ÄúThe event contracts offered by Robinhood Derivatives are regulated by the CFTC and offered through CFTC-registered entities,‚Äù wrote a company official in an email. ‚ÄúPrediction markets have become increasingly relevant for retail and institutional investors alike, and we‚Äôre proud to be one of the first platforms to offer these products to retail customers in a safe and regulated manner.‚Äù The subpoena reportedly asks for copies of Robinhood marketing materials and information about who in the state has engaged in March Madness futures trading through the firm. Robinhood (HOOD) stock has risen rapidly since it announced it would resume offering sports-related contracts ahead of March Madness. It closed up 9% for the day at $48.36 per share on Monday, and has increased from $36.02 on March 13. (This article has been updated with Monday‚Äôs closing stock price, and has corrected the number of states Robinhood is offering sports events futures in from 50 to 49, as an official said it has not launched in Nevada.)

data.Title: Everything You Need to Know About Investing With Robinhood Legend
data.Description: There‚Äôs been so much talk about making finance more democratic that it‚Äôs starting to get a little bit tiresome. It‚Äôs one thing to ruminate in the abstract about a world in which everyone ‚Äî not just the bigwigs and the corporate behemoths ‚Äî has access to the information required to maximize their potential as an investor. But traders have long been aware that, in order to make that dream a reality, they need better tools to monitor markets by the tick of the clock so that they can envision a trade and then make it when the prime opportunity strikes.

data.Title: Robinhood targets NASCAR fans with new 23XI deal
data.Description: 23XI Racing has landed well-known finance technology app Robinhood Markets as a new sponsor for 2025, showing that the team still can bring in big-name partners even as it navigates an antitrust lawsuit against NASCAR. data.Title: Relative Strength Alert For Robinhood Markets
data.Description:
Legendary investor Warren Buffett advises to be fearful when others are greedy, and be greedy when others are fearful. One way we can try to measure the level of fear in a given stock is through a technical analysis indicator called the Relative Strength Index, or RSI, which measures momentum on a scale of zero to 100. A stock is considered to be oversold if the RSI reading falls below 30.
In trading on Monday, shares of Robinhood Markets Inc (Symbol: HOOD) entered into oversold territory, hitting an RSI reading of 29.99, after changing hands as low as $29.66 per share. By comparison, the current RSI reading of the S&P 500 ETF (SPY) is 21.5. A bullish investor could look at HOOD's 29.99 RSI reading today as a sign that the recent heavy selling is in the process of exhausting itself, and begin to look for entry point opportunities on the buy side. The chart below shows the one year performance of HOOD shares:

data.Title: Robinhood's Stock Surge: A Closer Look
data.Description: Robinhood's stock price has seen a remarkable 60% increase over the past six months, reaching $40.80 per share. This surge is partially attributed to its solid quarterly results, as detailed in a recent Yahoo Finance article published on April 10, 2025. The company's commitment to democratizing finance through its commission-free stock and crypto trading platform has been a key driver of its growth. According to data from the IndexBox platform, Robinhood's average revenue per user (ARPU) has shown exceptional growth, averaging 43.9% over the last two years. This metric is crucial as it reflects the company's ability to monetize its user base effectively, with users spending significantly more than in previous years. Furthermore, Robinhood's earnings per share (EPS) have transitioned from negative to positive over the past three years, indicating a profitable growth trajectory. data.Title: From Ken Griffin to Robinhood: The Donors Who Funded Trump‚Äôs Inauguration Revealed
data.Description:
WASHINGTON‚ÄîDonald Trump‚Äôs inaugural committee raised almost $250 million from corporate America, more than doubling the previous record as companies sought to win favor with Trump and the incoming administration.

The record sum shows how the country‚Äôs largest and most powerful companies flocked to Trump in the period after the election, with senior executives traveling to his Florida club and cutting seven-figure checks. The previous record for an inaugural committee was about $107 million, which Trump amassed in 2017 in the run-up to his first-term swearing in. Other recent presidents have raised less than $100 million, according to financial disclosures.

data.Title: Why Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Is Up Today
data.Description: Shares of financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) jumped 8.7% in the afternoon session after crypto-linked stocks rebounded sharply as Bitcoin broke above the $90,000 mark, reinforcing investor confidence in digital assets. The rally coincided with a weakening US dollar, which appeared to boost demand for assets considered alternative stores of value. Crypto, especially Bitcoin, has been evolving to be one of those spots people flock to when they're worried about inflation or the dollar losing value.

data.Title: List of Flash News about Robinhood puts
data.Description: According to Nic Carter, a noted market analyst, current economic conditions are reminiscent of the Smoot-Hawley era, signaling potential downturns in global markets. Carter suggests that traders should consider hedging strategies such as purchasing puts, specifically highlighting his own action of buying puts on Robinhood (source: Twitter). This indicates a bearish outlook on tech stocks, potentially impacting trading decisions. Investors are advised to stay informed about macroeconomic shifts, as Carter's insights suggest a strategic approach to managing portfolios in volatile conditions.

data.Title: Robinhood's Strategic Opportunity: Listing HyperliquidX ($HYPE) for Profit Maximization
data.Description: On April 22, 2025, a notable X post by user @ThinkingUSD highlighted the potential for Robinhood to list $HYPE, a cryptocurrency from HyperliquidX, which has been described as one of the most profitable and fastest-growing crypto assets. According to CoinMarketCap data, $HYPE's price surged by 15% in the past 24 hours, reaching $5.32 at 10:00 AM EST on April 22, 2025, following the tweet. This surge indicates a significant market interest in $HYPE, driven by the anticipation of a listing on a major platform like Robinhood (CoinMarketCap, 2025-04-22). The trading volume of $HYPE also increased by 20% to 1.2 million $HYPE traded in the same period, showcasing robust liquidity (CoinMarketCap, 2025-04-22). Furthermore, on-chain metrics from Etherscan reveal that the number of active addresses interacting with $HYPE rose by 10%, from 5,000 to 5,500, within the last 24 hours as of 11:00 AM EST on April 22, 2025, indicating growing user engagement (Etherscan, 2025-04-22). The market capitalization of $HYPE stood at $532 million at the same time, reflecting its growing stature within the crypto ecosystem (CoinMarketCap, 2025-04-22).

data.Title: FINRA fines Robinhood: Many themes will be relevant for Neo-Brokers (regardless of jurisdiction)

data.Description: VANCOUVER, British Columbia--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Mogo Inc. (NASDAQ:MOGO) (TSX:MOGO) (‚ÄúMogo‚Äù or the ‚ÄúCompany‚Äù), a digital wealth and payments business, today announced that its portfolio company, WonderFi Technologies Inc. (TSX:WNDR) (‚ÄúWonderFi‚Äù), has entered into a definitive agreement (the "Arrangement Agreement") with Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ: HOOD) ("Robinhood") and a wholly owned subsidiary of Robinhood ("Purchaser"). Pursuant to the Arrangement Agreement, the Purchaser will acquire all of the issued and outstanding common shares of WonderFi ("Common Shares") for C$0.36 per Common Share by way of a statutory plan of arrangement under the Business Corporations Act (British Columbia) (the "Arrangement").

The purchase price represents a 41% premium to WonderFi's closing price and a 71% premium to its 30-day VWAP as of May 12, 2025.

data.Title: Robinhood Statistics And Facts (2025)
data.Description: Robinhood Statistics: Robinhood Markets Inc., founded in 2013 and headquartered in Menlo Park, California, is a financial services company offering commission-free trading in stocks, options, and cryptocurrencies. As of the end of 2024, Robinhood reported 25.2 million funded accounts and 26.2 million investment accounts. The company‚Äôs assets under custody reached $193 billion, a significant increase from the previous year. In 2024, Robinhood generated $2.95 billion in revenue, marking a 58% year-over-year growth, and achieved a net income of $1.41 billion, its first annual profit since 2020.

The firm‚Äôs positive outlook is rooted in the company‚Äôs ongoing product expansion, particularly in the cryptocurrency sector. The stock, currently trading at $62.57, has demonstrated remarkable momentum with a 247% return over the past year and a market capitalization of $55.2 billion. According to InvestingPro analysis, the stock appears to be trading above its Fair Value, with multiple indicators suggesting overbought conditions.

data.Title: WonderFi Reports Strong Q1 2025 Results and Announces Acquisition by Robinhood
data.Description: WonderFi Technologies Inc. reported $17.5 million in revenue and interest income for Q1 2025, marking its third highest revenue quarter. The company‚Äôs trading platforms, Bitbuy and Coinsquare, saw over $1.128 billion in trading volumes. Key operational highlights included the launch of a self-custodial Wonder Wallet and a Layer-2 blockchain, the acquisition of Blade Labs, and the launch of Bitcoin.ca for Bitcoin investor education. Additionally, WonderFi entered into an agreement with Robinhood Markets, Inc. for the acquisition of all its common shares, expected to complete in the second half of 2025, subject to approvals.

data.Title: Mysterious New Whale Pulls 260,000,000 DOGE out of Robinhood, XRP ETF Delayed by SEC, 137% Shiba Inu Surge in 24 Hours: Crypto News Digest by U.Today
data.Description: According to blockchain transaction data, yesterday, May 20, 260 million DOGE were spotted leaving Robinhood, a major U.S.-based brokerage platform. The value of the moved funds stands at over $57 million. The funds were transferred to an unknown wallet in two transactions, with the first one carrying the majority of coins, 210 million DOGE worth at $46 million and the second moving another 50 million DOGE to the same address. Currently, the final destination wallet holds around 420 million DOGE valued at nearly $92 million. Notably, the receiving wallet is not linked to any known exchange or custodial platform, and it has recently seen a steady increase in incoming Dogecoin. The transactions are part of a bigger trend of Dogecoin moving away from exchanges and into long-term storage, though the exact purpose of these transfers remains unclear.

data.Title: Introducing Robinhood Legend, a New Frontier for Active Traders
data.Description: There‚Äôs a powerful new trading platform for active traders looking to take their trading to the next level. Leading the charge is Robinhood‚Äôs trading platform, Legend, which launched in October and is free to anyone with a Robinhood account. The browser-based trading platform is built specifically for active traders and features a fully customizable platform allowing users to analyze, build, and execute trading strategies. The platform can be accessed from any device, appealing to active individuals who split their time in multiple locations or travel often.

data.Title: A band of merry men: Trademarks Opposition Board decision protects ‚ÄúRobinhood‚Äù trademark`
data.Description: On March 24, 2025, the Trademarks Opposition Board (the TMOB) released its decisions1 regarding the opposition of two trademark applications (application numbers 1866370 and 2019781) made by Robin Hood Inc. (the Applicant) for registration of the trademark ‚ÄúRobin Hood‚Äù (the  Applicant‚Äôs Mark). The Applicant‚Äôs Mark was filed in association with a wide variety of goods and services, including ‚Äúproviding online non-downloadable electronic books in the field of education.‚Äù The applications for the Applicant‚Äôs Mark were opposed by Robinhood Markets Inc. (the Opponent). The Opponent is a financial services company that provides a mobile application for securities trading and investing, and provides information regarding finance and investing. Specifically, the Opponent‚Äôs services include ‚Äúproviding information in the fields of investment and finance over computer networks and global communication networks.‚Äù

data.Title: Robinhood Legend Trading Platform Now Available in UK
data.Description:
Robinhood (NASDAQ: HOOD) says its Legend Trading Platform is now available for UK customers.

data.Title: Beyond Free Trades: 3 Ways Robinhood Continues to Innovate

Tenev needed a way to gain a foothold with young investors who had heard horror stories from their parents about the pitfalls of investing, including the dot com bust and the Global Financial Crisis (which had occurred 5 years before Robinhood‚Äôs founding).

Robinhood said Tuesday (June 17) that it has begun rolling out two tools as part of its effort to become the top destination for active traders.
The new tools include charting capabilities on mobile and options simulated returns pre-trade, the trading platform said in a Tuesday press release.

data.Title: An innovative financial services leader finds the right AI solution: Robinhood and Amazon Nova
data.Description: Robinhood has been a pioneer and disruptor in the once staid world of online brokerages. Founded in 2013, the company transformed an industry better known for gatekeeping into an open platform accessible to all. Robinhood pioneered commission-free trading, and harnessed the power of technology and intuitive design to create a seamless and engaging experience for modern investors. To this day, the company continues to disrupt the financial services industry by launching groundbreaking product innovations on AWS.

data.Title: Introducing the Robinhood Investor Index: A Stock Market Index Based on Investor Conviction
data.Description: Index investing has been proven to outperform active investing, and billionaires like Warren Buffett advocate for the use of index investing. Market indices track the performance of a group or basket of stocks that may represent a certain sector, industry or location. For example, the Nasdaq-100 is made up of 100 of the largest non-financial companies in the world, so investing in the index allows you to diversify your portfolio.

data.Title: Robinhood Markets, Inc. Reports May 2025 Operating Data
data.Description: Robinhood Markets (NASDAQ: HOOD) reported strong operating metrics for May 2025, with Total Platform Assets reaching $255 billion, up 10% from April and 89% year-over-year. The company maintained 25.9 million Funded Customers, adding 5,000 new accounts despite escheatment of 100,000 low-balance accounts. Trading volumes showed significant growth across all segments: Equity trading volumes increased 108% YoY to $180.5B, Options contracts rose 36% YoY to 179.8M, and Crypto trading volumes grew 65% YoY to $11.7B. Net Deposits were $3.5B, representing an 18% annualized growth rate. Margin balances doubled YoY to $9.0B, while Cash Sweep balances increased 52% YoY to $30.8B. Securities Lending Revenue grew 43% YoY to $33M.

data.Title: Robinhood Climbs As NYSE Gains, Bitcoin Bounces

data.Title: Beyond Free Trades: 3 Ways Robinhood Continues to Innovate
data.Description: Founded a little over a decade ago, Robinhood Markets Inc. ((HOOD Quick QuoteHOOD - Free Report) ) broke into an industry filled with dominant, legacy players such as Charles Schwab ((SCHW Quick QuoteSCHW - Free Report) ), Interactive Brokers ((IBKR Quick QuoteIBKR - Free Report) ), and even JP Morgan Chase ((JPM Quick QuoteJPM - Free Report) ). How did an obscure Menlo Park, California, start-up rise from obscurity to dominance? Founder and CEO Vladimir Tenev had a simple but revolutionary idea to disrupt a financial services industry ripe for disruption. Tenev needed a way to gain a foothold with young investors who had heard horror stories from their parents about the pitfalls of investing, including the dot com bust and the Global Financial Crisis (which had occurred 5 years before Robinhood‚Äôs founding).

data.Title: Robinhood Markets Insiders Sold US$33m Of Shares Suggesting Hesitancy
data.Description: The fact that multiple Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) insiders offloaded a considerable amount of shares over the past year could have raised some eyebrows amongst investors. When evaluating insider transactions, knowing whether insiders are buying is usually more beneficial than knowing whether they are selling, as the latter can be open to many interpretations. However, when multiple insiders sell stock over a specific duration, shareholders should take notice as that could possibly be a red flag.

data.Title: 155,000,000 DOGE Stun Robinhood, Shibarium Skyrockets 7,154% as Adoption Hits New Highs, Michael Saylor Explains Why Bitcoin Is Safe From Quantum Computers: Crypto News Digest by U.Today
data.Description: As reported by Whale Alert blockchain tracker, yesterday, June 10, an unknown wallet transferred 155,000,000 DOGE to Robinhood, a popular trading platform. The value of the moved funds stood at $30,064,203 at the time the transfer took place. The likely reason behind the move is a whale intending to sell their funds on the aforementioned platform. The transaction coincided with a 4.6% increase in DOGE's price, pushing the asset from $0.18674 to $0.19535. Meanwhile, Dogecoin is inching closer to reaching a new adoption milestone; its holder count is currently standing at 7.97 million holders, only 30,000 short of eight million. This makes Dogecoin the third most widely held cryptocurrency after Ethereum (148.38 million holders) and Bitcoin (55.39 million holders). At press time, DOGE is changing hands at $0.2026, up almost 6% over the past 24 hours, according to CoinMarketCap data.

data.Title: Jim Cramer Says eToro‚Äôs ‚ÄúProfitability is Nearly as Good as Robinhood‚Äôs‚Äù
data.Description:
eToro Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ETOR) is one of the 18 stocks Jim Cramer recently shared insights on. During the episode, Cramer mentioned the company and said:

‚ÄúAlright, about a month later‚Ä¶ another really popular trading platform, this one‚Äôs called eToro, debuted on the Nasdaq with a traditional IPO, and the market lapped it up‚Ä¶ So, how do these three brokerages, the platforms, stack up against each other? First, let‚Äôs take scale because scale is often what dictates what‚Äôs going to win in a brokerage area. At the end of the first quarter‚Ä¶ eToro had just 3.58 million funded accounts with 14.8 billion in assets under administration‚Ä¶ Webull and eToro are roughly the same size‚Ä¶ Now, what about the financials? We just want to look at revenue growth and some measures of profitability. But comparing the three companies‚Ä¶ is surprisingly challenging because they all use different key metrics‚Ä¶ But for eToro, we have to use the company‚Äôs net contribution, which is similar to the net revenue numbers from the other two‚Ä¶ eToro has slower growth but much better profitability than Webull‚Ä¶

data.Title: Robinhood funded customers at the end of May of 25.9M
data.Description: Robinhood (HOOD) Markets reported select monthly operating data for May 2025. Funded Customers at the end of May were 25.9 million. In May, Funded Customers grew by approximately 5 thousand after the impact of required escheatment of approximately 100 thousand low-balance accounts. Total Platform Assets at the end of May were $255 billion. Net Deposits were $3.5 billion in May, or a 18% annualized growth rate relative to April 2025 Total Platform Assets. Over the last twelve months, Net Deposits were $59.1 billion, or an annual growth rate of 44% relative to May 2024 Total Platform Assets. Equity Notional Trading Volumes were $180.5 billion. Options Contracts Traded were 179.8 million. Crypto Notional Trading Volumes were $11.7 billion . Margin balances at the end of May were $9.0 billion. Total Cash Sweep balances at the end of May were $30.8 billion. Total Securities Lending Revenue in May was $33 million. May 2025 results do not include the benefit of the Bitstamp acquisition which closed on June 2, 2025, including its approximately 500 thousand funded customers.

data.Title: Regulatory Crossroads: How Robinhood's Struggles Signal a New Era for Retail Trading Platforms
data.Description: The GameStop saga of early 2021 marked a turning point for retail trading platforms, thrusting them into the regulatory spotlight. For Vlad Tenev, co-founder and CEO of Robinhood, the fallout has been relentless. Over the past four years, his firm has faced over $100 million in penalties, systemic compliance failures, and scrutiny over its role in the meme-stock frenzy. But these challenges aren't just Robinhood's problem‚Äîthey're a harbinger of a shifting landscape for the entire industry. In a post-GameStop world, the race is on to balance innovation with regulatory rigor, and the winners will be those who master compliance while diversifying revenue streams.

data.Title: XRP News Today: Robinhood Launches Micro XRP Futures Contracts for Retail Traders
data.Description: Robinhood has expanded its cryptocurrency derivatives offerings by launching micro XRP futures contracts. These new contracts, announced on the social media platform X, represent 2,500 XRP units each, with a minimum tick size of 0.0005, giving each tick a value of $1.25. This structure provides a smaller-scale alternative to Robinhood‚Äôs standard XRP futures contract, which uses a 50,000-unit multiplier and a $25 tick value. The reduced contract size aims to make XRP futures more accessible to retail traders, allowing for more precise risk management and capital efficiency. These contracts are cash-settled and available for trading nearly 24 hours a day, from 6 p.m. to 5 p.m. ET.

data.Title: Tokenized Securities and the Democratization Dilemma: Navigating Robinhood's Stock Tokens and Regulatory Crossroads
data.Description: The promise of democratizing access to private markets has long tantalized investors, but Robinhood's recent foray into tokenized securities‚Äîpaired with OpenAI's sharp rejection‚Äîhas exposed the precarious balance between innovation and regulation. By enabling retail investors to buy fractional stakes in high-profile companies like SpaceX and OpenAI via blockchain tokens, Robinhood aimed to bridge the gap between everyday investors and exclusive private equity. Yet OpenAI's explicit disavowal of the tokens, coupled with U.S. regulatory hurdles, raises critical questions: Can tokenized securities truly democratize markets, or are they a regulatory minefield? For investors, the answer lies in understanding the risks, the regulatory landscape, and the path forward.

data.Title: Do Your Betting With Your Broker
data.Description: If you go on Robinhood you can bet on stocks. You can make as many bets as you want: You can just buy an index fund and hold it forever, but if you‚Äôd like more excitement you can buy a bunch of single-stock options every morning and sell them in the afternoon. If you make a lot of bets, you will win some and lose some: Even professional trading firms with very good records might win, you know, 53% of their bets. You‚Äôd be quite happy with 51%. If you make 1,000 trades a year, make $10,000 each on 510 of them (51%) and lose $10,000 each on the other 490, (1) that‚Äôs fine work and (2) you‚Äôre up $200,000 for the year.

data.Title: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (HOOD) Is Up 4.17% in One Week: What You Should Know
data.Description: Momentum investing is all about the idea of following a stock's recent trend, which can be in either direction. In the "long context," investors will essentially be "buying high, but hoping to sell even higher." And for investors following this methodology, taking advantage of trends in a stock's price is key; once a stock establishes a course, it is more than likely to continue moving in that direction. The goal is that once a stock heads down a fixed path, it will lead to timely and profitable trades.
